org.ujorm.tools.dom

Class HtmlElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ujorm.tools.dom.XmlElement
      • org.ujorm.tools.dom.HtmlElement

  • public class HtmlElement
extends XmlElement
    XML element model to rendering a HTML file

    How to use the class:

     final HtmlElement html = new HtmlElement("Test");
 html.getBody().addElement("div")
               .addText("Hello word!");
 HttpServletResponse response = new MockHttpServletResponse();
 html.toResponse(response, false);
    Since:
    1.86

                       boolean noCache)
                throws IOException,

        Render the component to a HTML response
        Parameters:
        httpServletResponse - Argument type of javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse is required.

        IllegalArgumentException - Wrong argument type
